name: Castle Flipper
description:
Castle Flipper is a unique chance to become a medieval royal craftsman. You can re-arrange the castle, at your own discretion. Breathe a whole new life into the old rooms and prepare a great feast for the king!
Manage reconstruction!
You will have to put a lot of work into the reconstruction of the conquered castle. Lead a group of workers and repair damaged walls, bridges, or towers.
Become a designer!
Design the surroundings of the castle. Choose and plant trees in the courtyards. Choose the shapes and patterns of your flags and pennants.
Explore the interior
You want to see what the castle chambers look like. Nothing easier. Choose a building and go inside. See what is inside, between the medieval walls.
Prepare the feast!
After a good job and a complete restoration, it's time to feast. Prepare a banquet room, cover the table and invite the workers to celebrate together with the king.
